text: People want an out. They want the idea or the potential to win regardless of how small it actually is, but they don't want to put in the effort to build strategies to actually create success. It gives them an out. They have the ability to try to make some money, but they're not putting in any effort. And then if they lose, well, it's no skin off their back. They don't really care because there's just a lot of them. They didn't really care. And that creates this really insane cycle. We're literally just throwing my away.
